channel.title: Compliing help-RIGHT HERE!
channel.description:
look if u got java update 3 put this in ur enirmont varabiles
"PATH" put this [code]C:\Program Files\PHP\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\;[/code]
classpath put this [code].;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\lib\ext\QTJava.zip[/code]
complier put this [code]@echo off COLOR 09 title PhoneScape Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java" server pause [/code] hope that helps

item.title: Compliing help-RIGHT HERE!
item.dc:creator: @murphy0lee murphy0lee
item.description:
@murphy0lee wrote:

look if u got java update 3 put this in ur enirmont varabiles

“PATH” put this

C:\Program Files\PHP\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\;

classpath put this

.;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

complier put this

@echo off COLOR 09 title PhoneScape Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java" server pause
hope that helps
